text: (upbeat music)

- Autodesk makes software
for people who design
and change the world.

Our technology spans from
architecture, construction,

manufacturing, product
design, media entertainment.
The challenge we saw with AWS

was to have a data-centric
security platform
that collects, centralizes, processes,

and then responds to the
configuration changes

in our highly dynamic
environment in near real time.
Pulsar is a data-centric security platform

that centralizes our
collection, processing,

and response capability
using the AWS services
like CloudTrail, like Lambda, S3,

and in turn allows us to
swiftly move to its remediation

and response in our highly
dynamic environment.

Pulsar has benefited internal
teams by allowing them to move

from identification to
remediation with the same velocity

that they would be
shipping code in most cases

and that, our external customers
have benefited tremendously

not just from security
posture, but just the velocity

that which this gets
shipped to production.
